comments.body: You almost certainly don't need this here.

diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +15,22 @@
         <appender-ref ref="STDOUT"/>
     </root>
 
+    <!-- Disable noisy DB logging at the start of sandbox -->
+    <logger name="com.digitalasset.platform.store.FlywayMigrations" level="WARN" />
+    <logger name="org.flywaydb" level="ERROR" />
+    <logger name="com.zaxxer.hikari" level="ERROR" />
+    <logger name="com.digitalasset.platform" level="WARN" />
+
+    <!-- raising the command tracker logging level -->
+    <logger name="com.digitalasset.platform.apiserver.services.tracking.TrackerMap" level="WARN" />
+
+    <!--
+    explicitly enabling the info logging for sandbox main and ledger api server
+    for the usual startup info logging (which port, dar files, etc...)
+    -->
+    <logger name="com.digitalasset.platform.sandboxnext" level="INFO" />

comments.body: I don't see how this comment relates to the lines below. Can you clarify this, please?

comments.body: The logging behavior is different from the one we have for Sandbox. Is this on purpose?
Yes; this is a much simpler version for testing. It's similar to _reference-v2_.

diffHunk:
